section.name: Introduction
section.p: PMD can be integrate through some of the Continuous Integration tools that exist now. Here is a list of known (to us) plugin to do so.

section.name: Hudson Plugin
section.p: Hafner Ullrich has developed a PMD plugin for Hudson. Please check the plugin homepage for more info.

section.name: Continuum
section.p: Continous does not have a plugin for PMD per see, but can failed the build according to the result of the PMD maven plugin.
